ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_inxp | |- ( ( A X. C ) i^i ( B X. C ) ) = ( ( A i^i B ) X. ( C i^i C ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_inidm | |- ( C i^i C ) = C |
| 3 | 2 | #P_xpeq2i | |- ( ( A i^i B ) X. ( C i^i C ) ) = ( ( A i^i B ) X. C ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_eqtr2i | |- ( ( A i^i B ) X. C ) = ( ( A X. C ) i^i ( B X. C ) ) |
